metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15927 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.20.2. An out-of-boundsaccess exists in the function build_audio_procunit in the filesound/usb/mixer.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15927` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-143.169
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-143.169
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-143.169
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
